actions.text: Send a confirmation e-mail for reset password

confirmation.message: Do you want to continue to send a confirm email
Seçili kayıttaki müşteri için hatırlatma SMS'i oluşturulacak. Devam etmek istiyor musunuz?
Bu kayıt keşif listesinden kaldırılacak ve randevu listesine aktarılacak. Devam etmek istiyor musunuz?

Lines: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, FullName, Role, Email, EmailConfirmed, IsInitialPassword, PhoneNumber, PictureUrl
SELECT * FROM {TablePrefix}USER WHERE IsDeleted = 0 AND Id = @Id
RAISERROR('Yalnızca randevu değişikliklerinde otomatik olarak SMS eklenir. ', 16, 1)
SELECT a.AppointmentId, a.SmsId, Flags, s.[Id], s.[CreationTime], s.[UpdateTime], s.[PhoneNumber], s.[Message], s.[Sender], s.[ScheduledSendingTime], s.[Sent], s.[Response]
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Sms s ON a.SmsId = s.Id
SELECT a.AppointmentId, a.SmsId, Flags, s.[Id], s.[CreationTime], s.[UpdateTime], s.[PhoneNumber], s.[Message], s.[Sender], s.[ScheduledSendingTime], s.[Sent], s.[Response]
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Sms s ON a.SmsId = s.Id
SELECT a.*, c.PhoneNumber, c.Name as CustomerName, s.Name as ServiceName, u.FullName as AssignedUserName
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Customer c ON a.CustomerId = c.Id
LEFT JOIN {TablePrefix}Service s ON a.ServiceId = s.Id
LEFT JOIN {TablePrefix}USER u ON a.AssignTo = u.Id
SELECT a.*, c.PhoneNumber, c.Name as CustomerName, s.Name as ServiceName, u.FullName as AssignedUserName
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Customer c ON a.CustomerId = c.Id
LEFT JOIN {TablePrefix}Service s ON a.ServiceId = s.Id
LEFT JOIN {TablePrefix}USER u ON a.AssignTo = u.Id
DELETE s FROM PA_Sms s INNER JOIN #ids a ON a.SmsId = s.Id
DELETE a FROM PA_AppointmentSms a INNER JOIN #ids s ON s.SmsId = a.SmsId
SELECT c.[Id] AS CustomerId, c.[Name], c.[PhoneNumber], c.[Email], c.[CityId], MAX(a.EndDate) AS LastAppointmentDate, COUNT(0) AS AppointmentCount
INNER JOIN [dbo].[PA_Appointment] a ON c.Id = a.CustomerId
GROUP BY c.Id, c.[Name], c.[PhoneNumber], c.[Email], c.[CityId]
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT Id FROM {TablePrefix}Appointment WHERE ServiceId = @Id)
RAISERROR('Bu hizmet tipi daha önce kullanıldığı için silinemez.', 16, 1)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT Id FROM {TablePrefix}Appointment WHERE CustomerId = @Id)
RAISERROR('Bu müşteri daha önce kullanıldığı için silinemez.', 16, 1)
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Country r ON c.CountryId = r.Id
WHERE c.Id = @Id AND NOT (UPPER(r.Alpha2) = 'TR' AND CAST(c.[Code] AS INT) <= 81)
SELECT a.*, c.PhoneNumber, c.Name as CustomerName
INNER JOIN {TablePrefix}Customer c ON a.CustomerId = c.Id
SELECT * FROM {TablePrefix}Appointment WHERE Id = @Id AND IsPlanned = 0
DELETE FROM {TablePrefix}Appointment WHERE Id = @Id AND IsPlanned = 0
SELECT CONVERT(varchar, StartDate, 7) AS StartDate, COUNT(*) AS [Count]
WHERE StartDate > CAST(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS DATETIME) - 30
